1636066912346.message: As a freelancer, you can deduct business expenses like office supplies, equipment, and even a portion of your home expenses if you have a dedicated workspace.

1636066912348.message: Yes, you can deduct various expenses as a freelancer. Some common deductions include office supplies, equipment, and a portion of your home expenses if you have a dedicated workspace.

1636066912350.message: It depends, there are tax credits like the Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC) and the Child and Dependent Care Credit that you may be eligible for. It's essential to explore all available credits to maximize your tax benefits.

1636066912352.message: You're welcome! Keeping detailed records of your income and expenses will make tax filing smoother and help you take advantage of all eligible deductions.
